metadata.title: Incorporating Sign in with Apple into other platforms

inlineContent.text: To add Sign in with Apple to apps that don’t have access to the

framework, you control the sign-in request manually. Perform this request by adding a custom Sign in with Apple button, sending the required query parameters, handling the return request, and returning control back to the app.

content.text: Add a custom Sign in with Apple button

inlineContent.text: Apple provides three secure HTTP URLs that generate Sign in with Apple button images corresponding to three modes: center-aligned, left-aligned, and logo only. Entering one of these URLs in a browser triggers the download of the related button image as a PNG file. Use this file to customize and embed your button of choice in your application or service. You can also test and preview custom buttons at
